attributes.action: Ensure the tax records of parliamentary members are released for scrutiny.
attributes.background:
To ensure our representatives are not corrupt or have ANY conflicting interests, all members of parliament must release their tax records for public scrutiny.

We must ensure the integrity of government.

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament don't currently have the power to do this. If you would like Parliament to change the law, to require all serving MPs to publish their tax returns, you could start a new petition asking for that.
